questions.question: What is the word for 'a way in a city or town that has houses and buildings'?
questions.explanation: A 'Street' is a public road in a city or town.

questions.question: Which word means 'a very tall building'?
questions.explanation: A 'Tower' is a tall narrow building, either freestanding or forming part of a building.

questions.question: Choose the word for 'the place where you were born and grew up'.
questions.explanation: Your 'Hometown' is the town or city that you come from.

questions.question: Which adjective describes a place with 'too many people'?
If you live in a 'Village', you live in the...
questions.explanation: A 'Village' is a group of houses and associated buildings, larger than a hamlet and smaller than a town, situated in a rural area.

questions.question: What is a 'Flat'?
options: A set of rooms for living in
questions.correctAnswer: A set of rooms for living in
questions.explanation: A 'Flat' (apartment) is a set of rooms forming an individual residence.

questions.question: Which activity do you do in the morning to clean your teeth?
To 'Surf the internet' means to...
questions.explanation: 'Surf the internet' means to spend time visiting a lot of websites.

questions.question: What comes after 'Wake up' in a daily routine?
questions.explanation: After you 'Wake up' (open eyes), you 'Get up' (leave the bed).

questions.question: Which word tells you how often you do something (e.g., 100% of the time)?
questions.explanation: 'Always' means at all times; on all occasions.

questions.question: A 'Project' at school is usually...
questions.explanation: A 'Project' is an enterprise that is carefully planned and designed to achieve a particular aim.

questions.question: Which meal do you eat in the evening?
questions.explanation: 'Dinner' is the main meal of the day, taken in the evening.

questions.question: If a street is 'Busy', it has...
questions.explanation: 'Busy' means having a great deal to do; occupied.

questions.question: A 'District' is a part of a...
questions.explanation: A 'District' is an area of a country or city.
